name: Mystery Science, Inc.
description: Provider of open-and-go lessons designed to increase curiosity among children regarding science subjects. The company's open-and-go lessons reach children through elementary school teachers to develop a scientific understanding, enabling children to investigate their questions.
one_liner: Provider of open-and-go lessons designed to increase curiosity among children regarding science subjects. The company's open-and-go lessons reach children through elementary school teachers to develop a scientific understanding, enabling children to investigate their questions.
